faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: This course covers the fundamentals of data analytics and its applications in the business context . The course will cover the essentials of data analysis methods and tools, foundations of data visualisation, decision-making under uncertainty and practical business data analytics. The course will also include two group-assignments and seminars for presenting their results as well as guest lectures delivered by senior specialists working in the business data analytics domain. The course will conclude with a recap and Q&A session.
description.et: See kursus hõlmab andmeanalüütika põhialuseid ja selle rakendusi äriotsuste kontekstis. Kursusel käsitletakse selliseid teemasid nagu andmeanalüüsi meetodite ja tööriistade põhialused, andmete visualiseerimise alused, otsuste tegemine määramatuse tingimustes ja praktiline äriandmete analüüs. Aine raames toimuvad ka kaks grupitööd ja seminari grupitööde tulemuste tutvustamiseks. Äriandmete analüütika spetsialistid annavad külalisloenguid. Kursus lõpeb kokkuvõtte ning küsimuste ja vastuste sessiooniga.

objectives.en: The objective of the course is to provide students with the necessary fundamental knowledge on how to analyse data and derive insights from it to solve problems in the business context. Students will be familiarised with various data analysis methods and tools as well as will learn how to interpret and communicate insights from data to make informed business decisions.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on anda üliõpilastele vajalikud alusteadmised andmeanalüüsist ja selle rakendamisest äriprobleemide lahendamiseks. Üliõpilased tutvuvad erinevate andmeanalüüsi meetodite ja tööriistadega ning õpivad tõlgendama saadud tulemusi ja edastama infot äriotsuste tegemiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon successful completion of the course, students will:
1. Understand what data analytics is as a broad domain and how it is utilised to solve problems in the business context to deliver value;
learning_outcomes.et: 1. mõistavad, mis on andmeanalüüs laiemalt ning teavad, kuidas seda kasutatakse äriotsuste kontekstis probleemide lahendamiseks;

learning_outcomes.en: 2. Understand the basics of data analysis and visualisation;
learning_outcomes.et: 2. mõistavad andmete analüüsi ja visualiseerimise põhitõdesid;

learning_outcomes.en: 3. Be familiar with different data analysis methods and tools;
learning_outcomes.et: 3. tunnevad erinevaid andmeanalüüsi meetodeid ja vahendeid;

learning_outcomes.en: 4. Understand the basics of deriving insights from data and communicating them;
learning_outcomes.et: 4. mõistavad andmetest teadmiste tuletamise ja selle edastamise põhitõdesid;

learning_outcomes.en: 5. Be familiar with how data analytics is practised by specialists to address business questions;
learning_outcomes.et: 5. on kursis, kuidas teatud ettevõtetes andmeanalüüsi äriküsimuste lahendamiseks kasutatakse;

learning_outcomes.en: 6. Develop skills in storytelling and working in groups.
learning_outcomes.et: 6. on arendanud lugude jutustamise oskust ja grupis töötamist.

independent_work.en: 6 Moodle Quizzes; 1 Individual Assignment; 1 Group Work
independent_work.et: 6 Moodle Quizzes; 1 Individual Assignment; 1 Group Work

name.et: International Institute of Business Analysis. (2020). Guide to Business Data Analytics (version 1.0). International Institute of Business Analysis.
Paczkowski, W. R. (2022). Business Analytics: Data Science for Business Problems. Springer Nature.
Provost, F., & Fawcett, T. (2013). Data Science for Business: What you need to know about data mining and data-analytic thinking. " O'Reilly Media, Inc.".
Albright, S. C., & Winston, W. L. (2014). Business analytics: Data analysis & decision making. Cengage Learning
Marr, B. (2016). Big data in practice: how 45 successful companies used big data analytics to deliver extraordinary results. John Wiley & Sons.
Knaflic, C. N. (2015). Storytelling with data: A data visualisation guide for business professionals. John Wiley & Sons.
Knaflic, C. N. (2019). Storytelling with Data: Let's Practice!. John Wiley & Sons.
